department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of Laboratory and Scientific equipment
description: This is an advance contract award notice (ACAN) for the purchase of online subscription service on real estate transactions for RCMP Westmount, Quebec. All inquiries and submission of statements of capabilities must be submitted before 14:00HAE on July 26, 2023
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
=================

### M5100-234458: Online Subscription Service for Real Estate Transactions

** Tender Information **

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4075083669
*   **Tender Closing Date**: July 26, 2023, 14:00 EDT
*   **Publication Date**: July 10, 2023
*   **Amendment Number**: 0
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

** Procurement Details **

*   **Procurement Category**: SRV
*   **UNSPSC Code**: 41100000
*   **UNSPSC Description**: Laboratory and scientific equipment
*   **Procurement Method**: Advance Contract Award Notice

** Trade Agreements **

*   This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity and Delivery**

*   None

**Contracting Entity and End User**

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
*   **Contracting Entity Contact**: Julie Carbonneau, julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **End User**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
*   **End User Address**: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A OR2

**Notice and Description**

*   All inquiries and submissions of statements of capabilities must be made by July 26, 2023, 14:00 EDT. The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is issuing an Advance Contract Award Notice
